attributes.additional_details: The Theory and Hazard Perception tests are absolutely ridiculous, I think making you do these two tests on the same day with only a three minute break is psychological torture! The fail rates are going up but no one seems to do or say anything about this, so it's about time someone puts their foot down. Please sigh my petition if you believe there should be a stop to these tests and make them change the rules to how they used to be.
